attributes.review: I downloaded this app solely to get the biased and bigoted news that come from it but I notice a feature it had and it interested me. I clicked a red button, not knowing what it was, and thatâ€™s when my life turned upside down. When I clicked the button a picture of each member of my family came up and next to each one was a date. As the first date drew nearer I started to get more and more anxious. Finally the day came and when I woke up my brother was DEAD. This happened with every single member of my family. WHO MAKES AN APP THAT KILLS PEOPLE???? Now I am living on the streets and scrubbing gum off peoples shoes for a living. attributes.review: So I downloaded the Trump app to support our current president. Upon downloading it, the first photo to pop up was of a carrot... I was so confused. I was expecting a photo of our current president but I guess a carrot and Trump go hand-in-hand.  It asked to send me notifications, which is always a burden. After having the app for a few days. Everything started turning orange... like everything... I started having nightmares of Trump telling me coronavirus wasnâ€™t real (even though I know people who had it in December). I started losing sleep and started to look worse and worse. My skin became pale and I look sickly. So I started using self tanner. Now instead of just seeing orange.. I am orange. DO NOT GET HIS APP! YOU WILL ALSO BECOME ORANGE!
